Reviews.Title: “Good for lads trip. Not as bad as most of these reviews”
Reviews.Author: Paul M
Reviews.Content: isnt hostel hotel stay perfect adequate guys trip amsterdam left booking late globe hotels near station availability reviews trip advisor terrible little reluctant book pleased stay true chinese chap reception unhappy life dont expect warm arrival wont bar staff sportsbar friendly private 5 bed stayed clean ensuite looked despite busy peaceful night sleep safe globe sportsbar food downstairs wasnt bad arriving home develop bites possibly bed bug nat bites feature hotel close train station ideally placed red light district coffee shops leave hotel youre thick action recommend hotel trip possibly backpackers probably pricey definitely stay isnt bad alternative

Reviews.Title: “Decent Hostel”
Reviews.Author: BlueFigh
Reviews.Content: ive read reviews cant believe people negative spent weekend 9 friends 2 booked 8 persons 3 persons private bathrooms looked perfectly clean maintained plain simple bunk beds normal beds clean lockers corridor remember bring own padlock location perfect centre town edge red light district reception bar impressions feel dump staff polite issues friend mine expect guess polite friendly likewise guess applies relatively cheap centre town basic adequate

Reviews.Title: “C'mon! I had a great time at The Globe!”
Reviews.Author: Ducon
Reviews.Content: stayed twice march believe lot criticism result miserable pos staff due archaic dutch labour laws else met globe fantastic guys bar nicest ive met girls reception sweet yu champion left mobile march waiting returned 2 months dont dorm opt 6 bed ensuite doors onto canal sweet definately quiet retreat woods expect youre staying red light pub huge smoking smoking definately fun ignore miserable night guy hell probably die unhappiness soon

Reviews.Title: “Dirty and full of smoke. Did NOT feel safe.”

Reviews.Content: friend stayed globe hostel night booked 2 beds staff beds charged 2we arrived 3am choice stay else booked bed hostel carpets filthy thick haze smoke top 13 hallway security cameras corners females traveling ourselves unsafe spend extra money stay someplace else

Reviews.Title: “Go anywhere else!”

Reviews.Content: awful staff friendly helpful 20 slept toilets okay showers dirty hole ceiling placed rough amsterdam close station worst bed bugs lot reviews

Reviews.Content: hotel globe hostel stayed dont deserves harsh comments receiving website clean six traveling comfortable walking bare feet linens towels spotless incidentally beg bug free guy front desk night unfriendly aggravate people day ate breakfast decent nice probably sensing desperation bunch free coffee refills washroom floor recently renovated showered morning bunch ones floor below clean functioning apparently shower floor didnt hot water bar average beer cheap weekdays note 24hr bar websites location absolutely perfect perfect six stay nights look couple websites taking comments seriously bed bugs mentioned tripadvisor

Reviews.Content: globe sports bar hotel purely money operation based stag parties dirty weekends casual backpacker lot safer cleaner quieter stay reviews bedbugs cant verify experience location particularly dodgy town hotel means secure people whom ive met staying missing including introduction euro hotel bargain rip value money elsewhere time spent unforgettable heck party check details

Reviews.Title: “Bare-Bones Hostel, but Not Bad”
Reviews.Author: kylehardgrave
Reviews.Content: hostel pretty barebones fine budget traveler theres free wifi bar downstairs cheap beer red light district staff helpful finding giving directions helping amsterdam breakfast amenity associate hotel name deceiving didnt experience bed bugs stay worth price

Reviews.Title: “BED BUGS!!!”
Reviews.Author: achard87
Reviews.Content: hostel disgusting ive stayed hostels world worst hostel stayed bitten bed bugs entire body covered uncomfortable bites hostel dirty lockers secure bathrooms nasty loud recommend hostel sleep streets hostel

Reviews.Title: “It is actually a good place”
Reviews.Author: Jack289
Reviews.Content: returned weekend amsterdam friends stayed hostel admit feared worst reading lots reviews bad lot doubts honestly fine fun granted set dingy roomsbathrooms thats staff friendly offering wasnt satisfied ours bar till 5 amsterdam closes stay friendly social environment youre aloud upstairs card security personally understand opinion trip stride brilliant time doing hostel stay
